vote.title: Authorize a three-year service price agreement for pipe leak detection equipment, maintenance, and repairs for the Dallas Water Utilities Department - FLUID CONSERVATION SYSTEMS INC, only proposer - Estimated amount of $733,260.52 - Financing:  Dallas Water Utilities Fund (subject to annual appropriations)
